None.Name: Protect the Environment!
None.Description: Installs peace and harmony among friendly and hostile units. Within a 25m radius all combat operations will be interrupted for 20 seconds. What is more, all friendly nature units that enjoy the peaceful setting for at least 5 seconds will then take courage and take 50% less damage for 20 seconds even if they leave the area. Reusable every 25 seconds.
